panels.title: Welcome to the Wang Lab
panels.description: In the Integrative Pancreatic Cancer Research (iPanCare) Lab, we aim to advance understanding of pancreatic cancer, with a particular emphasis on precision prevention, diagnostics and medicine. Our work focuses on developing strategies for personalized prevention, individualized risk prediction, early detection, and tailored therapeutic and prognostic tools for pancreatic cancer.

panels.title: Lab Value
panels.description: In our lab, we are driven by a shared commitment to motivation and enthusiasm of scientific discovery, fueling our curiosity to advancing knowledge. We value creativity, encouraging innovative thinking and out-of-the-box approaches to complex research questions. Integrity is central to everything we do, guiding us to uphold the highest standards of honesty, transparency, and ethical conduct. We also embrace flexibility, recognizing the importance of adaptability in a dynamic research environment and supporting a healthy work-life balance. These values define our culture and inspire us to grow, contribute, and succeed together.
